CustomInformation.ColumnValue: set abz_resource_id=s.unique_name from srm_resources s inner join cmn_sec_users u on u.id=s.user_id where u.user_name=odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_owner and odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id=?

set abz_level=1 from ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_RUNLOG r inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_CONFIG c on c.code=r.abz_jira_conf_ins where r.id= odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id and abz_issue_type in (select value from ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS m where m.OBJECT='abz_jira_intg_config' and m.ATTRIBUTE='abz_level_1_task' and m.pk_id=c.id) and odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id=?

set abz_level=2 from ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_RUNLOG r inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_CONFIG c on c.code=r.abz_jira_conf_ins where r.id= odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id and abz_issue_type in (select value from ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS m where m.OBJECT='abz_jira_intg_config' and m.ATTRIBUTE='abz_level2_tasks' and m.pk_id=c.id) and odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id=?
Copy Parent Issue Key to Parent Task Key - Issues
set abz_ppm_task_status= case when abz_status='To Do' then 0 when abz_status='In Progress' then 1 when abz_status='Done' then 2 else null end where odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id=?

set abz_update_team=1 where abz_resource_id in ( select s.unique_name from inv_investments i inner join prteam t on t.prprojectid=i.id inner join srm_resources s on s.id=t.prresourceid where s.unique_name=odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_resource_id and i.id=odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_project_id) and odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id=?
Set Do not Update Team - Issues

set abz_ppm_res_id=srm.unique_name from cmn_sec_users cmn inner join srm_resources srm on srm.user_id=cmn.id where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_owner=cmn.user_name and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_update_assgmnt=1 where abz_resource_id in ( select s.unique_name from inv_investments i inner join prtask t on t.prprojectid=i.id inner join PRASSIGNMENT a on a.PRTASKID=t.PRID inner join srm_resources s on s.id=a.prresourceid where s.unique_name=odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_resource_id and i.id=odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_project_id and t.PREXTERNALID=odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_issue_key) and odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.abz_level=2 and odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues.odf_parent_id=?
Set Do not Update Assignment - Issue

set abz_project_code=inv.code from inv_investments inv where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id=inv.id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_ppm_task_prid =t.prid from prtask t inner join inv_investments inv on inv.id=t.prprojectid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id=inv.id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_issue_key=t.prexternalid and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_ppm_asg_id = a.prid from prassignment a inner join prtask t on t.prid=a.prtaskid inner join srm_resources s on s.id=a.prresourceid inner join inv_investments inv on inv.id=t.prprojectid where inv.id=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id and t.prid=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_task_prid and s.unique_name=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_res_id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_timeperiod_id=tp.prid from prtimeperiod tp where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_date >=tp.prstart and tp.prfinish > odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_date and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_timesheet_id=ts.prid from prtimeperiod tp inner join prtimesheet ts on ts.prtimeperiodid=tp.prid inner join srm_resources s on s.id=ts.prresourceid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_res_id=s.unique_name and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timeperiod_id=tp.prid and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_timesheet_start=format(tp.prstart,'yyyy-MM-dd') from prtimeperiod tp where tp.prid=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timeperiod_id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_timesheet_end=format(tp.prfinish,'yyyy-MM-dd') from prtimeperiod tp where tp.prid=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timeperiod_id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_ppm_task_name=t.prname from prtask t inner join inv_investments inv on inv.id=t.prprojectid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id=inv.id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_issue_key=t.prexternalid and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_tp_open=tp.prisopen from prtimeperiod tp where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timeperiod_id=tp.prid and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_timesheet_id = '-1' where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timesheet_id is null and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timeperiod_id is not null and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?
Set Timesheet ID for New Timesheets - Worklog

set abz_version=ts.prversion from prtimesheet ts where ts.prid=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timesheet_id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?
set abz_version = 1 where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timesheet_id ='-1' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?
Set Version for New Timesheets - Worklog

set abz_ts_status = ts.prstatus from prtimesheet ts where ts.prid=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timesheet_id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_level =1 where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_issue_type in (select m.value from ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_RUNLOG r inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_CONFIG j on j.code=r.abz_jira_conf_ins inner join ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS m on m.pk_id=j.id and m.attribute='abz_level_1_task' where r.id=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id) and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?
set abz_ts_status=0 where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_timesheet_id='-1' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id=?
Set Timesheet Status on New Timesheets - Worklog

set abz_level =2 where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_issue_type in (select m.value from ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_RUNLOG r inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_CONFIG j on j.code=r.abz_jira_conf_ins inner join ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS m on m.pk_id=j.id and m.attribute='abz_level2_tasks' where r.id=odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id) and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_ppm_trackmode = p.PRTRACKMODE from PRJ_RESOURCES p inner join SRM_RESOURCES s on s.id = p.prid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_res_id = s.UNIQUE_NAME and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_owner is not null and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_res_id is not null and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source = 'abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog. ODF_PARENT_ID = ?

set abz_res_open=p.prisopen from prj_resources p inner join srm_resources s on s.id=p.prid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_res_id=s.unique_name and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_owner is not null and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_ip_type_code_id=typ.prexternalid from prj_resources p inner join srm_resources s on s.id=p.prid inner join prtypecode typ on typ.prid=p.prtypecodeid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_res_id=s.unique_name and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_owner is not null and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_level = 2 and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_charge_code_id=case when cct.prexternalid is null then cci.prexternalid else cct.prexternalid end from inv_investments inv inner join prtask t on t.prprojectid=inv.id left join prchargecode cci on cci.prid=inv.chargecodeid left join prchargecode cct on cct.prid=t.prchargecodeid where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id=inv.id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_ppm_task_prid=t.prid and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_level = 2 and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_donot_upload =1 where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_issue_type not in (select m.value from ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_RUNLOG r inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_CONFIG j on j.code=r.abz_jira_conf_ins inner join ODF_MULTI_VALUED_LOOKUPS m on m.pk_id=j.id and m.attribute='abz_level2_tasks' where r.id= odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id) and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?
Set Do Not Upload on Issues - Worklog

set abz_prj_opente=i.IS_OPEN_FOR_TE from inv_investments i where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id=i.id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?

set abz_prj_track_mode=i.TRACK_MODE from inv_investments i where odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_project_id=i.id and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.abz_source='abz_jira' and odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog.odf_parent_id = ?
Set Track Mode on Projects - Worklog
set abz_ppm_asg_id = null where abz_ppm_task_status = 0 and odf_parent_id =?
select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_project_id is null and feed.odf_parent_id=?
Project ID cannot be Null - Issues
select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_project_name is null and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
Project Name cannot be Null - Issues
select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_issue_key is null and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
Issue Key cannot be Null - Issues

select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_RUNLOG r on r.id=feed.ODF_PARENT_ID inner join ODF_CA_ABZ_JIRA_INTG_CONFIG c on c.code=r.abz_jira_conf_ins where feed.abz_owner is not null and feed.abz_resource_id is null and (c.abz_team_sync=1 or c.abz_assignment_sync=1) and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
JIRA User does not exist in PPM.
select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_issue_name is null and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
Issue Name cannot be Null - Issues
select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_sprint is null and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
Issue is not associated to any sprint.

select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_parent_issue_key not in ( select t.prexternalid from prtask t inner join inv_investments inv on inv.id=t.prprojectid inner join odf_ca_project p on p.id=inv.id where p.jira_project_key= feed.abz_project_key and p.abz_sync_jira=1 union select f.abz_issue_key from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues f where f.odf_parent_id = feed.odf_parent_id and f.abz_level = 1 ) and feed.abz_level=2 and feed.abz_parent_task_id is not null and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
Parent Issue does not exist in PPM or the current feed.
select feed.id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues feed where feed.abz_parent_issue_key is null and feed.abz_level = 2 and feed.odf_parent_id = ?
Level 2 Issue must be associated with a parent issue.
No Parent Issue for Level 2 - Issues
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_ppm_res_id is null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
JIRA User does not exist in PPM.
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_project_id is null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Project ID cannot be blank - Worklogs
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_ppm_asg_id is null and f.abz_ppm_res_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
User not assigned to the task in PPM.
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_timeperiod_id is null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
PPM timeperiod for the corresponding worklog date does not exist.
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_tp_open = 0 and f.abz_timeperiod_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Timperiod in PPM is not open.
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_ts_status not in (0,2) and f.abz_timeperiod_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_res_open =0 and f.abz_ppm_res_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Resource is not open for time entry.
Resource is not Open for Time - Worklog
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_ppm_trackmode !=2 and f.abz_ppm_res_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Resource track mode is not set to PPM.
Resource Track Mode is not PPM - Worklog
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_prj_opente=0 and f.abz_project_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Project is not open for time entry.
Project is not Open for Time - Worklog
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_prj_track_mode!=2 and f.abz_project_id is not null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Project Track mode is not set to PPM.
Project Track Mode is not PPM - Worklog
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_ppm_task_prid is null and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.abz_donot_upload=0 and f.odf_parent_id=?
Task does not exist in PPM.
select f.id from odf_ca_jira_feed_worklog f where f.abz_level =1 and f.abz_source='abz_jira' and f.odf_parent_id=?
Worklog on Level 1 Issues/Tasks cannot be uploaded into PPM.

Select iss.id issue_id , iss.code issue_code , iss.abz_project_name project_name , iss.abz_project_code project_code , iss.abz_resource_id resource_id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues iss inner join odf_ca_abz_jira_intg_runlog rlog on rlog.id = iss.odf_parent_id inner join odf_ca_abz_jira_intg_config int_cnfg on int_cnfg.code = rlog.abz_jira_conf_ins and int_cnfg.abz_team_sync = 1 where iss.abz_resource_id is not null and iss.abz_error = 0 and iss.abz_validation_error = 0 and iss.odf_parent_id = ?

Select iss.id issue_id , iss.code issue_code , iss.abz_project_name project_name , iss.abz_project_code project_code , iss.abz_issue_name issue_name , iss.abz_outline_level outline_level , iss.abz_parent_task_id parent_task_id , iss.abz_issue_key task_id , iss.abz_start abz_start_time , iss.abz_end abz_end_time , iss.abz_issue_id jira_issue_id , iss.abz_issue_type issue_type , iss.abz_pnts_cmptd pnts_cmptd , iss.abz_sprint sprint_name , iss.abz_story_pnts story_pnts , case when iss.abz_summary_task = 1 then 'true' else 'false' end is_summary ,iss.abz_ppm_task_status tsk_status from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues iss where iss.abz_error = 0 and iss.abz_validation_error = 0 and iss.odf_parent_id = ? order by iss.abz_outline_level

<Project name="##project_name##" projectID="##project_code##"> <Tasks> <Task name="##issue_name##" status="##tsk_status##" outlineLevel="##outline_level##" parent="##parent_task_id##" taskID="##task_id##" finish="##abz_end_time##T17:00:00" start="##abz_start_time##T08:00:00" summary="##is_summary##"> <CustomInformation> <ColumnValue name="abz_issue_id">##jira_issue_id##</ColumnValue> <ColumnValue name="abz_issue_type">##issue_type##</ColumnValue> <ColumnValue name="abz_jira_pnts_cmptd">##pnts_cmptd##</ColumnValue> <ColumnValue name="abz_jira_sprint">##sprint_name##</ColumnValue> <ColumnValue name="abz_jira_story_point">##story_pnts##</ColumnValue> </CustomInformation> </Task> </Tasks> </Project>

Select iss.id issue_id , iss.code issue_code , iss.abz_project_name project_name , iss.abz_project_code project_code , iss.abz_issue_name issue_name , iss.abz_outline_level outline_level , iss.abz_issue_key task_id , iss.abz_resource_id resource_id from odf_ca_abz_jira_feed_issues iss inner join odf_ca_abz_jira_intg_runlog rlog on rlog.id = iss.odf_parent_id inner join odf_ca_abz_jira_intg_config int_cnfg on int_cnfg.code = rlog.abz_jira_conf_ins and int_cnfg.abz_assignment_sync = 1 where iss.abz_resource_id is not null and iss.abz_error = 0 and iss.abz_validation_error = 0 and iss.odf_parent_id = ?

<Project name="##project_name##" projectID="##project_code##" > <Tasks> <Task name="##issue_name##" outlineLevel="##outline_level##" taskID="##task_id##"> <Assignments> <TaskLabor resourceID="##resource_id##" /> </Assignments> </Task> </Tasks> </Project>
